headline: Digital Utility Market Size to Surpass USD 535.3 Billion by 2032, Owing to the Rapid Adoption of Smart Grid Technologies and AI-Based Utility Solutions | SNS Insider
summary: The global Digital Utility Market is witnessing remarkable growth, fueled by the expanding deployment of smart grid infrastructure, digital transformation across utility operations, and increasing reliance on AI and cloud-based solutions.Pune, June 19, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Digital Utility Market Size Analysis: “The Digital Utility Market was USD 198.0 billion in 2023 and is expected to reach USD 535.5 billion by 2032, growing at a CAGR of 11.71% over the forecast period of 2024–2032.” Get a
